classData.comment:

classData.comment:
/**
         * Valid values: 'center', 'end', 'start', 'stretch', null
         * @member {String|null} align_=null

classData.name: align_

classData.comment:
/**

classData.name: direction_

classData.comment:
/**
         * flex css allows gap. This adds it to the component style

classData.description: flex css allows gap. This adds it to the component style

classData.comment:
/**

classData.name: pack_

classData.description: Valid values: nowrap, wrap, wrapreverse
classData.name: wrap_
